constructor.details: function is called every time someone wants to register a new marriage certificate

params.newLocation: =  holds JSON string with location details*
params.newSpouse1: =  holds JSON string with first spouse details
params.newSpouse2: =  holds JSON string with second spouse details
params.spouse2address: = keeps second spouse address for validation purposes

returnBalance().details: only the two spouses have access to this function

changeMarriageStatus().notice: allows spouses to change contract state

deposit(uint256).notice: allows spouses or third parties to deposit money in marriage contract

withdraw(uint256).notice: allows spouses to withdraw money from the account
